interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Minions [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2016/06/12
Store: Sandra Bullock  (Actor),     Jon Hamm  (Actor),     Kyle Balda  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'The Minions, breakout stars from "Despicable Me," are presented in an origin story that showcases their unpredictable personality and physicality, and pairs them with equally memorable human characters. As it turns out, Minions have existed since the beginning of time. They have evolved from single (yellow) cell organisms into the familiar beings we know, and they live for a collective purpose: to seek out and serve the most despicable master they can find. Academy Award winner Sandra Bullock will lead the voice cast of the human characters as Scarlett Overkill, the world\'s reigning super-villain of the 1960s.', 'Set Contains:', 'Includes Dolby Atmos \uf02d Dolby Atmos is a revolutionary new audio technology that transports you into extraordinary entertainment experience. With Dolby Atmos enabled receivers and speaker configurations, sound comes from all directions, including overhead, to create an immersive experience with clarity, richness, details, and depth. With existing home theater systems, you will get a great surround sound experience.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Illumination Entertainment, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Les Mins, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Despicable Me, Comedy, The Minions Picture, Action & Adventure, Minion MovieIllumination Entertainment, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Les Mins, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Despicable Me, Comedy, The Minions Picture, Action & Adventure, Minion Movie   See more', 'Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Sandra Bullock, Steve Carell, Jon Hamm, Chris Renaud, Hiroyuki Sanada, Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French Canadian (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.03 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35222343', 'Director': 'Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 8, 2015', 'Actors': 'Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud, Steve Carell', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Not as funny as I was hoping...
Review Title: Good
Rating: 3.0

reference_summary:
Inglourious Basterds [Blu-ray] Brad Pitt (Actor), Mike Myers (Actor), Quentin Tarantino (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure ['Brad Pitt takes no prisoners in Quentin Tarantino’s high-octane WWII revenge fantasy Inglourious Basterds. As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as “The Basterds,” is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user enjoys action and adventure films with high suspense and intense storytelling. They also appreciate science fiction and fantasy, particularly narratives integrating contemporary technological themes, but have broadened their interest to include animated family films, albeit with some reservation regarding humor quality.
- **Director Affinity:** They appreciate acclaimed filmmakers, maintaining a fondness for Quentin Tarantino and Peter Jackson, while also being open to animated works with engaging storytelling, demonstrated by their recent purchase from a notable studio.
- **Actor Favoritism:** The user enjoys films featuring charismatic actors, highlighting favorites like Johnny Depp, Paul Bettany, Ian McKellen, and Martin Freeman. Their recent purchasing choice includes actors renowned for their voice performances, showcasing versatility in their preferences.
- **Format Preference:** They favor Blu-ray and 3D formats for high-quality viewing experiences, reflecting a love for immersive cinematic presentations.
- **Technical Awareness:** The user is technically savvy and values seamless playback experiences, investing in compatible technologies to enhance viewing enjoyment.
- **Mixed Experience:** While they appreciate many films, they remain critically discerning about content, evidenced by their moderate review of a family-oriented film, indicating a nuanced approach to entertainment that values both cinematic quality and humor.

Overall, the user profile reflects an evolving appreciation for various cinematic experiences, spanning action, fantasy, and family-friendly films, while maintaining a focus on quality storytelling and performance.
